A: advantage as in take advantage, of
afraid as in I'm afraid not/so
as in if you ask  me ...

B: better as in I'h be better of
blame as in be to blame
blue as in out of the blue

C: clue as in I haven't a clue
court as in go to court

D: doubt as in I doubt it

E: end as in at the end
extent as in to some certain
eye as in keep an eye on

F: favour as in in favour of
fold as in fold in half
fortune as in cost a fortune

G: grateful as in I would be
guess as in I guess so

H: hair  as in lose your hair
half as in fold in half
hand as in lend sb a hand
hand as in on the one
have no intention of doing sth
hurry as in in a hurry

I: imagine as in I imagine so

J: joking as in you must be  joking, you're joking

K: keen as in be keen on

L: long as in as long as

M: make as in can you make it?
meant as In be meant to
meantime as in in the meantime
mind as in on your mind

N: nap as in have a nap
need as in a need for
note as in make a note of
notice as in hand in your

O: opinion as in in my opinion
order as in out of order

P: point as in there's no point in
point as in what's the point of ...? pointed
prison as in go to prison
public as in member of the public

R: record v (= put onto a disc)
relationship as in in a relationship
residence as in hall of residence
result as in as a result
rid as in get rid of
right as in have the right to
row as in have a row
rush as in in a rush

S: same as in all the same
seem as in it seems to me
speech as in make a speech
style (= way sth is written or drawn)
subway (= path under a road railway)

T: tear as in burst into tears
temper as in keep your temper
think as in I (don't) think so
time as in from time to
two as in fold in two

U: up as in it's up to me

W: while as in after a while
whole as in on the whole
words as in in other words
work as in out of work
